headline: Adobe: Risks Of Being Upended By AI Rivals Are Getting Real (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Adobe faces challenges from AI-first rivals, with slow AI revenue growth raising doubts.

headline: Despite Limited Near-Term Catalysts, Oppenheimer Reaffirms Salesforce (CRM) at Overweight
summary: Salesforce Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the 10 best tech stocks to buy according to billionaires right now. On June 9, an analyst at Oppenheimer reiterated his Outperform rating on the stock and maintained a $370 price target. In this latest note, the analyst pointed to a positive tone from the company management in their recent meeting, […]
